statements: SELECT * FROM quiz_questions;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM quiz_questions;
SELECT question_id, question_text, correct_answer FROM quiz_questions WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT correct_answer, incorrect_answer1, incorrect_answer2, incorrect_answer3 FROM quiz_questions;
SELECT question_text, incorrect_answer1, incorrect_answer2, incorrect_answer3 FROM quiz_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_questions WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM quiz_questions WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT question_id, question_text, correct_answer, incorrect_answer1 FROM quiz_questions WHERE correct_answer LIKE 'A%';
SELECT question_text FROM quiz_questions WHERE incorrect_answer3 IS NOT NULL ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_id, question_text, correct_answer, incorrect_answer1, incorrect_answer2, incorrect_answer3 FROM quiz_questions WHERE correct_answer = 'True';
SELECT * FROM quiz_questions;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM quiz_questions WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_responses WHERE student_id = 10 AND is_correct = true;
SELECT question_id, chosen_answer FROM student_responses ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM quiz_questions WHERE question_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM quiz_questions WHERE question_id = 1
SELECT * FROM student_responses WHERE is_correct = TRUE
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM student_responses GROUP BY student_id
SELECT question_text FROM quiz_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC
SELECT student_id, chosen_answer FROM student_responses WHERE chosen_answer <> correct_answer
SELECT * FROM Quiz;
SELECT quiz_id, quiz_name FROM Quiz WHERE quiz_topic = 'Science';
SELECT question_text FROM Question WHERE quiz_id = 1 ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT answer_text, is_correct FROM Answer WHERE question_id = 3 AND is_correct = TRUE;
SELECT a.answer_text, q.question_text FROM Answer a JOIN Question q ON a.question_id = q.question_id WHERE q.quiz_id = 2 ORDER BY q.question_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Answer WHERE is_correct = TRUE;
SELECT quiz_name, quiz_topic FROM Quiz ORDER BY quiz_name DESC;
SELECT question_text, answer_text FROM Question JOIN Answer ON Question.question_id = Answer.question_id WHERE is_correct = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Question WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT quiz_name, COUNT(*) AS total_questions FROM Quiz JOIN Question ON Quiz.quiz_id = Question.quiz_id GROUP BY quiz_name HAVING total_questions > 3;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, total_marks FROM quizzes WHERE total_marks >= 50;
SELECT student_name, quiz_name, score FROM students JOIN quiz_attempts ON students.student_id = quiz_attempts.student_id;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT class_name, total_marks FROM classes JOIN quizzes ON classes.class_id = quizzes.quiz_id;
SELECT student_name, quiz_name, score FROM students JOIN quiz_attempts ON students.student_id = quiz_attempts.student_id JOIN quizzes ON quiz_attempts.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id;
SELECT student_name, quiz_name, score FROM students JOIN quiz_attempts ON students.student_id = quiz_attempts.student_id JOIN quizzes ON quiz_attempts.quiz_id = quizzes.quiz_id WHERE score > 80;
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_students FROM classes JOIN students ON classes.class_id = students.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer, difficulty_level FROM Questions WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT question_text, difficulty_level FROM Questions WHERE difficulty_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND LENGTH(question_text) < 100;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth < '1995-01-01' ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM Results GROUP BY student_id, course_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80;
